headline: 'Legal Siege' Looms Against Social Media Companies
summary: Meta, Snap, Bytedance, and Alphabet are set to appear in court over two consolidated lawsuits accusing the social media operators of knowingly designing their platforms to addict users, resulting in depression, anxiety, insomnia, and self-harm. Bloomberg's Olivia Carville discusses the cases and possible repercussions with Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on "Bloomberg Tech."
